txt.en: 'Your assistance is greatly appreciated, Duvodiad. Our knowledge of my father's final resting place shall lead to my people's freedom. \n\n'Fernvael will be put to rest.'
Resting Place
You have examined the inscription
'The first marker lies to the north of here.'
You have found the correct inscription
'The first marker lies to the north of here.'
You have examined the inscription

The first cairn-marker may be found outside a barrow to the north of the Hall of Sanctuary.\n\nLhudd instructed you to find the cairn-markers which denote the house of Fernvael, bearing the mark of a crowned boar. This symbol may also be found among the barrows of Fernvael's followers.
'The second marker lies to the south of here.'
You have found the second inscription

'The second marker lies to the south of here.'
You have examined the inscription

The second cairn-marker may be found outside a barrow to the south of the Hall of Sanctuary.\n\nLhudd instructed you to find the cairn-markers which denote the house of Fernvael, bearing the mark of a crowned boar. This symbol may also be found among the barrows of Fernvael's followers.
'The third marker lies further to the south of here.'
This appears to be Crug Fernvael

The second cairn-marker may be found outside a barrow to the south of the Hall of Sanctuary.\n\nLhudd instructed you to find the cairn-markers which denote the house of Fernvael, bearing the mark of a crowned boar. This symbol may also be found among the barrows of Fernvael's followers.
'The third marker lies further to the south of here.'
Examining the inscription

The third cairn-marker may be found outside a barrow further to the south of the Hall of Sanctuary.\n\nLhudd instructed you to find the cairn-markers which denote the house of Fernvael, bearing the mark of a crowned boar. This symbol may also be found among the barrows of Fernvael's followers.
'Bring news of Crug Fernvael to Cadelhin at once!'
This appears to be the final resting place of TBD Shade

The third cairn-marker may be found outside a barrow further to the south of the Hall of Sanctuary.\n\nLhudd instructed you to find the cairn-markers which denote the house of Fernvael, bearing the mark of a crowned boar. This symbol may also be found among the barrows of Fernvael's followers.
Cadelhin is at Crug Cadelhin in the Lich Bluffs.\n\nLhudd told you to bring news of Crug Fernvael's location to the shade Cadelhin.
TBD Search the Cairn Markers in near the fourth barrow.
TBD Seek out and speak to TBD Shade Son
Locate the correct inscription
Locate the second inscription
Locate the last inscription
Talk to Cadelhin at Crug Cadelhin
Speak to TBD Shade Son

The location of the final resting place of Cadelhin's father Fernvael has been lost over the years. There are a series of inscriptions which denote his tomb that, once deciphered, will reveal his location.

'With Cadelhin's awakening, it has become of greatest import for us to find the ancient resting place of his father Fernvael. 

'Among the barrows, there may be markings near the entryways that denote who was interred at each place. They may provide clues to the identities of those who are buried within. Seek out these markers in front of the cairns. One of them will be Crug Fernvael, I am certain. Look for the symbol of a crowned boar.

'The first cairn-marker lies to the north of here, the second to the south, and the last even further south, deeper into the barrows. If you find Crug Fernvael, you should bring news of its location to Cadelhin.'
